entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,938Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 48

Summary: “Well,” Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, “at least this time he didn’t almost get us all killed.”Derek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. “I was drunk.” They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It’s steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. “You were careless,” she says. Not angry. Not loud. Certain. “You are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.” Derek nods once, reflexive. “When you speak,” Talia continues, “you do so as a Hale. As Alpha blood. Your indulgences do not absolve you of that.” ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions, and a mistake he keeps repeating.

entry.summary:
Author: NiklausScratchIII

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,912Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 209

Summary: Stiles is the new wolf in town, on the run from something he's not ready to face. Derek is a new single parent, and has no idea what he's doing, but hes doing his best dammit. Will their vastly different needs find a way to align, or is a neighbor wolf just a neighbor wolf at the end of the day.orDerek is drowning in single parenthood. Stiles loves babies. entry.title: Stiles and the wolf plushie
entry.summary:
Author: Babyexecutioner

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,742Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 10

Summary: Rolling onto his side, he pulls the wolf plushie from under him and rubs its fur against his face as he starts humping his pillow in earnest. The different sensations add to his pleasure—the velvety ears kissing his cheek, a butterfly kiss that blinks his eyelashes closed on the hard eye, the rough press of its plastic snout against his own. Without thinking, the tip of his tongue darts out to feel the texture more closely. Slightly salty but mostly tasteless, it’s warmer than he thought it would be. God, he wants to lick Derek. His oral fixation is worse than ever, and he’s always wanted him in his mouth. He’d take any part of him. The flat of Stiles’s tongue rolls out against the plastic nose again, but this time he slows the motion, letting out a low moan before stuffing it into his mouth to shut him up. Grinding against the pillow in small circles creates sparks that tingle under his skin. The dimples of his ass flex with each push forward. Mouthing at the snout again, he alternates open-mouthed kisses into its open mouth and felt tongue and sloppy licks, matting the fur under his own wet tongue.

entry.title: Black Out Days
entry.summary:
Author: Maifire

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,336Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 2,894

Summary: He made his way towards the kitchen, twiddling a light bulb in between his fingers and pausing in the doorway. This was so stupid. The invites had gone out weeks ago, and since then Scott hadn’t given him the time of day. Stiles knew it had to do with the pack, but it still hurt. It wasn’t easy being the only human in a group of werewolves, but honestly what was he expecting? After Scott had been bitten, nothing was the same.--Or the one where Stiles was kicked out of the pack because of what's happening with Theo and ends up leaving Beacon Hills with his new friend, returning two years later as a man no one thought he could become. takes place during season 5.

entry.title: And She Makes Us Three
entry.summary:
Author: Marniesaras23

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,134Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Re-write of Teen Wolf with my OC as Derek and Stiles's fated mate. Polyamorous relationship between two men and one woman.Halle always found Beacon Hills boring and frankly, hell on earth, thanks to her alcoholic, abusive mother. The only positives in her life were her two best friends, Scott and Stiles.When Scott gets bit in the woods and mysteriously has superpowers, the three friends are thrown into a world they could never have known existed.To make matters even more complicated, it seems as though the resident werewolf, Derek Hale, can't seem to keep himself away from Halle and Stiles. The two friends find themselves drawn to him, too, but the supernatural world is not all it seems.

entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 436,492Chapters: 38/40Kudos: 1,051

Summary: “Have you ever heard of the butterfly effect?” Stiles looked up and shook his head. “No… what is it?” “It’s the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it’s wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.” He nodded, that’s exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place… then none of this would be happening. But fuck it, ‘caution’ isn’t in his vocabulary. ~~~ Updates every Monday <3

Author: RiddlesSin

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 737Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Beacon Hills is a town where the WiFi is bad, the trauma is permanent, and everyone is a little bit gay if you squint hard enough.Welcome to a Teen Wolf BxB One-Shot Collection featuring:emotionally constipated werewolves,boys who fall in love during near-death experiences,accidental confessions,locker room tension,soulmate nonsense,and at least one character saying “this is a bad idea” right before doing it anyway.Each one-shot is standalone, wildly unhinged, and written with the same energy as someone who grew up on Wattpad in 2011, survived Tumblr discourse, and now copes by making fictional men kiss.Read in order. Read out of order. Read at 2AM when you should be sleeping.I’m not your mom. (Unless Melissa McCall adopts you.)

entry.title: The Voyeur
entry.summary:
Author: Book_Sniffer

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,996Chapters: 9/40Kudos: 12

Summary: Stiles never meant to use his binoculars for anything but the force of good, but that’s probably how a lot of villains start out. The road to Hell and all that. But honestly, if the Universe didn’t want him to spy on his neighbours, it would have told Hottie McScowlface across the yard to buy a set of curtains when he first moved in.Or to work out with clothes on.Or to take his weekly conquests to another apartment for sexy times - one with curtains or without any windows at all. Thank God, it didn't.
